country.title: Country Code
country.description: ISO country code for Where the tax identity was issued.

locality.title: Locality Code
locality.description: Where inside a country the Tax ID was issued, if required.

document.title: Document Code
document.description: What is the source document of this tax identity.

meta.title: Meta
meta.description: Additional details that may be required.

TaxIdentity.description: TaxIdentity stores the details required to identify an entity for tax purposes.
